yatithala pahasukam sanwardhanaya wegawath karamin pura nanguma wyapruthiya yatathe disthrikka hatharakata ayath palath palana aayathana 22k sanwardhanaya kirimata rajaya thiranaya karayi.ee anuwa anuradhapuraya, polonnaruwa, puththalama saha monaragala disthrikkayanta ayath palath palana aayathana 22k me wyapruthiya yatathe sanwardhanaya kirimata thoragena athayi aarthika sanwardhana amathi basil rajapaksha mahatha prakasha karayi.me wenuwen amerikanu dolar miliyana 86k (rupiyal koti 1,100) wayawana athara eyin amerikakanu dolar miliyana 50k (rupiyal koti 640) anthar jathika sanwardhana eejansiye naya mudalak lesa loka bankuwa haraha shri lankawata laba dena bawa sandahan karana ee mahatha amerikanu dolar miliyana 18.8k (rupiyal koti 240) ostreliyanu rajaye aadharayak lesa laba dena bawada ithiri mudala shri lanka rajaya mangin laba dena bawada penwa deyi.uthuru nangenahira palathe kriyathmaka karanu labu pura naguma wyapruthiye samastha sarthakathwaya salakillata gena aluthin ekathu wu palath palana aayathana 22 sandaha da mulya pradanayan sidukirimata ostreliyanu rajaya thiranaya kara thibena bawada basil rajapaksha mahatha kiyasiti.
